title: Holding ctrl does not deselect things in the scene view

content.raw:
To reproduce

* Add a model to gazebo
* left click the model
* hold ctrl and left click model
* hold ctrl and left click ground plane

Final state:

* Palette shows ground plane selected
* Scene shows model selected
* Joint control panel shows ground_plane selected


I would expect that when the model was clicked the second time while holding ctrl the white box around it in the scene view would have been removed.

![selection_bug.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1631966174-selection_bug.gif)
